data.title: Case Studies
data.meta_description: This chapter presents a list of fifty cultural landscapes in Israel that were identified, researched, and mapped by the Israel Nature and Parks Authority. They are organized according to the following classification: properties inscribed on the World Heritage List,...
data.text:
Aviad Sar Shalom8,

Yuval Peled9,

Rachel Singer10,

Irit Amit-Cohen11,

Rafi Rich12,

Avraham (Avi) Sasson13 &

…

Elissa Rosenberg14

81 Accesses

The original version of the chapter has been revised: Belated corrections for chapter footnotes have been updated in page 46 and 78. A correction to this chapter can be found at https://doi.org/10.1007/978-3-031-33685-0_8
